title: Is anyone studying the 'Consequentia Mirabilis'? - Quora

response.answer_text: The “Consequentia Mirabilis” was studied in different moments, this so called “Clavius Law” (Consequentia mirabilis - Wikipedia) have a fundament the Law no-contradiction (Law of noncontradiction - Wikipedia) and      which is true?; the first proposition or the second proposition? The door is binder or breaker?Logic k-valued is one form to overcome this “paradox”, dont worry it is very easy.
